name: Brain in Iron

trait.name: Detect Sentience
text: The brain in iron can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The brain in iron has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
text: The brain in iron's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect thoughts, mage hand, zone of truth
3/day each: charm person, command, hold person
1/day each: compulsion, hold monster, sleep (cast at 3rd level), Tasha's hideous laughter

action.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
text: The brain in iron magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 13 (2d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: detect thoughts, mage hand, zone of truth, charm person, command, hold person, compulsion, hold monster, sleep, Tasha's hideous laughter
